title: Windows 10 - Removed Monitoring Junk  -- Home x64
description:
Just a basic, trimmed version of Windows 10, with Cortana removed (monitoring and tracking)

and OneNote, which has similar components, 

Printer and outside languages have also been removed. for size. (english only)



Note: this isnt a perfect unmonitored version, Some windows monitoring is built in, get a firewall program and block Microsoft IP's to help out with anonymity :)
